title: Direction of force at point X

content.question: A negative point charge is placed at point <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>X</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following best indicates the direction of the electric force exerted on the particle?

choices.label: The figure shows an arrow that slants upward and to the right.
The figure shows an arrow that slants downward and to the left.
The figure shows an arrow that slants upward and to the left.
The figure shows an arrow that slants downward and to the right.

content.answer: The figure shows an arrow that slants downward and to the right.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
